author: @Sweethoney03
text:
I loved the meaning of this song, I find it comforting and hopeful and it leaves me with a very nice feeling after listening to it, like affection🤍💗
The fact of embracing our past self, accepting both the good and the bad, thanking it for all the good times and for enduring and overcoming pain and difficulties and not giving up, moving forward, is what made us who we are today and it is nice to be able to fondly remember our self who tried so hard and say "thank you" for not giving up and for taking us to where we are today, now I will continue to strive for both of us so that our future self is proud as I am of you.
I also think it is very important that it talks about the fact of not holding on to the past, it can be with both the good and the bad, you have to learn to accept, to let go and let go, nobody says to forget, but to move forward in order to grow and evolve and not stay stagnant.
I am grateful to the people who were behind the creation of this beautiful song💝🥰
